sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"充分的，丰富的"之意。
means: abundant ：着重某物极为丰富有或大量的供应。
plentiful ：普通用词，指某物的数量多得称心如意，不过剩，但较少用于描写抽象之物。
ample ：指某物不仅满足了需要而且有余。

sentence.Network_en: There is a plentiful supply of arms on the black market.
sentence.Network_cn: 黑市上有大量武器出售。

sentence.Network_en: Best buys of the week are carrots, which are plentiful and cheap.
sentence.Network_cn: 本星期买胡萝卜最合算, 因为货源充足,价格低廉.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语专业四级词汇表(全)_百度文库 ... pleasure n. 舒畅，快乐；乐事 plentiful a. 丰富的，富裕的 plenty n. 丰富，充足，大量.
常见后缀_百度文库 ... threefold 三倍的 - plentiful 大量的; handful 满手的 -.
字典中浞字的解释 ... (1) 沾湿;浸渍[ moisten;soak] 富足[ plentiful] ◎ 浞 zhu&#243.
★新东方托福高频词汇-托福考试(TOEFL)-无忧考网 ... 达到，获得 achieved 丰富的，充裕的 plentiful 独特的，奇异的 strange.

list.abs: 大丰 English, 翻译, 发音, 字典 Chinese... ... 丰桉 eucalyptus dives 丰登 bumper crop;plentiful harvest 丰度 abundance.
人教版九年级上册英语单词表 ... piety 虔诚 plenty of 许多 get along wiht 和某人相处.
高中英语常用固定短语_百度知道 ... on the point of 正要……的时候 plenty of 充足的，相当多的 remind sb of 使某人想起.
immediately flush eyes with plenty of water will be clean ., 请立即用大量清水将眼部冲洗乾净.
you have plenty of time free ., 你有足够的时间自由.

entry.def: Things that are plentiful exist in such large amounts or numbers that there is enough for people's wants or needs.

example.ex: Fish are plentiful in the lake.
...a plentiful supply of vegetables and salads and fruits.
example.tran: 蔬菜、色拉和水果的充分供应

means.word_mean: 1. existing in great number or quantity;

auth_sentence.content: Of course, variations on these phenotypes are plentiful.
auth_sentence.res_content: Of course, variations on these phenotypes are plentiful.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Of course, variations on these phenotypes are plentiful.

auth_sentence.content: For longer trips, taxis are plentiful and inexpensive.
auth_sentence.res_content: For longer trips, taxis are plentiful and inexpensive.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For longer trips, taxis are plentiful and inexpensive.

auth_sentence.content: Britain had plentiful supplies of coal, for instance.
auth_sentence.res_content: Britain had plentiful supplies of coal, for instance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Britain had plentiful supplies of coal, for instance.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无限的、绝对的,充分的, 完全的
stems_affixes.word_buile: plen满,填满+ary……的→adj.无限的、绝对的,充分的, 完全的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 许多的, 大量的, 丰富的, 丰饶的
stems_affixes.word_buile: plenty丰富+ful表形容词→plentiful许多的, 大量的
plenty[n.丰富,大量]+itude状态→plentitude满的状态→充分
de去掉+plen满,填满+ish表动词→去掉满→倒空
re再+plen满,填满+ish表动词→再弄满

Sentence.sentence: Migrants to cities are attracted by plentiful jobs, access to hospitals and education, and the ability to escape the boredom of a farmer's agricultural life.

sentences.en: Their family has a plentiful harvest this year.

jushi.english: The camp has a plentiful supply of food.
Their family has a plentiful harvest this year.
The dinner was well cooked and plentiful.
jushi.chinese: 饭菜烧得很好而且量也多。
